Pre-Game Insights: India is placed in a tough group but are anticipated to perform well
Expectations are high as India joins the competition, and fans are anticipating a great encounter that will begin on Saturday, January 13, 2024.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game, which will take place at the Ahmed bin Ali Stadium, is expected to be a close one as both teams want to establish an early lead in Group B
The Socceroos prevailed 4-0 in their most recent meeting between these two sides, which took place in the 2011 tournament.
Others: The Indian football team will face Australia in the AFC Asian Cup. With a talented team, India aspires to make a mark in the competition.
Sunil Chhetri and Gurpreet Singh Sandhu will be crucial in establishing India's hopes against a challenging opponent like Australia.
